summary: RADIATOR AND COOLING SYSTEM FAILED ON MY 1997 BMW 540I.  CAR QUICKLY OVERHEATED SEVERELY AND SHUT DOWN ON INTERSTATE 5 IN STOCKTON, CA WITH MY WIFE AND CHILD IN THE CAR.      THE SYSTEM FAILED A SECOND TIME IN MARCH 2002.  SAME OCCURANCE, RADIATOR AND COOLING SYSTEM FAILED ON HIGHWAY 580 IN TRACY, CA.  CAR SHUT DOWN DUE TO FAILURE.
